metadata.title: CVE-2016-7980 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability inecrire/exec/valider_xml.php in SPIP 3.1.2 and earlier allows remoteattackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests thatexecute the XML validator on a local file via a crafted valider_xmlrequest.  NOTE: this issue can be combined with CVE-2016-7998 to executearbitrary PHP code.

criterions.comment: spip package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
